core.title: Alternative Lending Platform Software for MCA & ABL
core.description: Launch your alternative lending platform faster. White-label software with underwriting automation, borrower onboarding, RBAC, Plaid, Stripe, and multi-tenant architecture for MCA and ABL funders.
core.h1: Alternative Lending Platform for MCA, ABL & Working Capital Lenders
core.intro: Build and launch your alternative lending operation in weeks, not months. Lendgismo delivers production-ready lending platform software with automated underwriting, borrower portals, and enterprise-grade integrations—fully white-labeled for your brand.

sections.body: Power your MCA, asset-based lending, or working capital programs with a modern lending platform designed for non-bank lenders. Our alternative lending software includes digital intake, decisioning rules engine, collections workflows, and investor reporting—all built for speed and compliance. Deploy faster with pre-integrated Plaid bank data, QuickBooks sync, Stripe payments, and fraud detection APIs.

Serve multiple brands, ISOs, or partner lenders from a single codebase. Configure credit policies, branding, and workflows per tenant with strict data isolation. Perfect for MCA funders managing multiple programs or ISOs white-labeling for clients.

Standardize credit decisions with configurable scorecards, rules, and automated cash-flow analysis from bank and accounting data. Reduce manual review time by 70% while maintaining credit quality. Every decision is logged for audit trails and compliance reporting.

Built-in integrations with Plaid (bank verification), QuickBooks (financial data), Stripe (ACH/card payments), Twilio (SMS OTP), SendGrid (email notifications), DataMerch (trade lines), and DecisionLogic (fraud/verify). Connect your existing tools via REST APIs and webhooks.

Own your stack. No revenue share or per-transaction fees. Launch in 2-4 weeks with a battle-tested codebase built for MCA, ABL, and SMB lenders. Full source code, documentation, and white-glove support. Deploy on your infrastructure or ours.

core.intro: Scale your MCA operation with purpose-built lending software. Automate deal intake, underwriting, funding, collections, and ISO management—all in one white-label platform designed for merchant cash advance lenders.

sections.body: From application to funding to collections, Lendgismo handles the full merchant cash advance lifecycle. Digital merchant onboarding with bank statements, automated revenue analysis, configurable advance rates and holdback percentages, batch funding, and automated ACH/card collections with reminders.

Integrate Plaid for instant bank account verification and daily revenue monitoring. Analyze merchant cash flow, transaction velocity, and NSF patterns to make better underwriting decisions. Set automated alerts for collection triggers and early warnings.

Pre-built decisioning logic for MCA use cases: factor rates, holdback calculations, revenue multiples, and stacking analysis. Configure approval thresholds, auto-decline rules, and manual review queues. Every decision is auditable with timestamp and reasoning.

sections.h2: Built for MCA Funders Who Need Speed
sections.body: Deploy in weeks, not months. No rev-share or transaction fees—you own the code. Includes compliance audit trails, investor reporting, and full white-label branding. Trusted by merchant cash advance lenders funding $500K–$50M+ annually.

core.h1: Asset-Based Lending Software for ABL Lenders
core.intro: Manage ABL portfolios with specialized lending software built for collateral-heavy lending. Track inventory, AR aging, field exams, and borrowing base certificates—all in one auditable platform.

sections.body: Track eligible collateral categories (A/R, inventory, equipment) with automated advance rate calculations. Generate borrowing base certificates, monitor loan-to-value ratios, and set alerts for covenant breaches. Support for AR aging, inventory turns, and appraisal tracking.

Document field exams with photo uploads, collateral verification checklists, and inspector notes. Link findings to borrower profiles and flag discrepancies for follow-up. Export audit trails for compliance and investor reporting.

Configure credit policies specific to asset-based lending: advance rates by collateral type, concentration limits, cross-aging schedules, and dilution analysis. Automate eligibility checks and generate exception reports for manual review.
Connect QuickBooks and accounting systems for real-time AR/AP data. Integrate with Plaid for operating account monitoring and cash sweeps. Use Stripe for automated ACH payments and fee collections.

Built by lenders who understand collateral complexity. White-label your platform, own the code, and deploy in weeks. Includes compliance logging, investor reporting templates, and API access for custom workflows.

Support multiple SMB loan products from one platform: term loans, revolving credit, merchant cash advances, equipment leases, and invoice factoring. Configure unique underwriting criteria, pricing models, and servicing workflows per product.

sections.body: Deploy faster than legacy LOS systems. White-label branding, role-based access, compliance audit trails, and investor-ready reporting. Own your tech stack with full source code—no vendor lock-in or per-loan fees.

sections.body: Schedule ACH debits, card payments, and wire transfers with automated retry logic for failed payments. Send payment reminders via SMS and email. Track payment history, partial payments, and prepayments with full audit trails.

Scale from hundreds to thousands of loans without changing systems. White-label branding, role-based access for servicing teams, and API access for custom integrations. No per-transaction fees—you own the platform.

core.intro: Reduce manual underwriting time by 70% with automated rules, scorecards, and data-driven decisioning. Purpose-built for alternative lenders who need speed without sacrificing credit quality.

sections.body: Configure credit policies with if-then rules, scoring matrices, and approval thresholds. Set auto-approval limits, auto-decline criteria, and manual review triggers. Support multiple loan products with product-specific underwriting logic.

Analyze bank transactions via Plaid, accounting data from QuickBooks, and merchant processing statements. Calculate revenue trends, expense ratios, debt service coverage, and available cash flow. Flag anomalies for manual review.

Pull credit reports, verify business identities, and screen for fraud with pre-integrated APIs. Connect DataMerch, DecisionLogic, Experian, and other data providers. Automate credit pulls based on application triggers.

Create custom underwriting checklists with required documents, verification steps, and approval stages. Track completion status, assign tasks to underwriters, and enforce quality controls. Every action logged for audit trails.

sections.h2: Why Lenders Trust Our Underwriting Tools
sections.body: Faster decisions without manual bottlenecks. Consistent credit quality with transparent logic. Full audit trails for compliance and investor reporting. White-label deployment in weeks with ongoing support.

core.title: Borrower Onboarding & Document Collection Software

core.h1: Borrower Onboarding & Digital Document Collection
core.intro: Convert more loan applications with frictionless digital onboarding. Branded borrower portals with KYC verification, document upload, e-sign, and real-time status tracking.

sections.body: Replace paper applications with mobile-optimized digital forms. Borrowers complete applications in minutes, upload documents via phone camera, and track progress in real-time. Auto-save progress and send completion reminders.

Verify borrower identities with automated KYC checks, business verification, and document validation. Integrate with KYB providers for corporate filings, beneficial ownership, and fraud screening. Flag suspicious applications for manual review.

Automated document requests with customizable checklists per loan product. Borrowers upload bank statements, tax returns, financial statements, and contracts. OCR extraction, version control, and secure storage with audit trails.

Send term sheets, loan agreements, and disclosures for electronic signature. Track signature status, send reminders, and store executed documents with timestamps. Compliant with ESIGN Act and state regulations.
Mobile-first UX optimized for completion rates. Reduce drop-off with progress indicators, auto-save, and SMS/email reminders. White-label branding builds trust and reduces friction.

core.title: KYC, KYB & AML Compliance for Lenders | Lendgismo
core.description: Automate KYC, KYB, and AML compliance with identity verification, business checks, and fraud screening. Compliance software for alternative lenders.
core.h1: KYC, KYB & AML Workflows for Lending Compliance
core.intro: Meet BSA/AML requirements with automated identity verification, business checks, and transaction monitoring. Purpose-built for alternative lenders navigating fintech regulations.

sections.body: Verify borrower identities with government ID checks, address validation, and PEP/sanctions screening. Integrate with identity verification providers for real-time results. Store KYC records with audit trails for regulatory exams.

Validate business entities with Secretary of State filings, EIN verification, and beneficial ownership disclosure. Screen for sanctioned entities, shell companies, and fraud indicators. Automate UCC lien searches and corporate registry checks.

Monitor payment patterns for suspicious activity with configurable alert thresholds. Flag large deposits, rapid withdrawals, and structuring behavior. Generate SARs (Suspicious Activity Reports) with supporting documentation.
Every KYC/KYB check logged with timestamp, result, and operator. Maintain records for FFIEC exam readiness. Export compliance reports for auditors, regulators, and investor due diligence.
Navigate state licensing, BSA/AML, and OFAC requirements with confidence. Pre-integrated with leading verification providers. White-label deployment with ongoing regulatory updates.

core.title: Plaid Bank Data Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
core.description: Integrate Plaid for instant bank verification, cash-flow analysis, and account monitoring. Pre-built Plaid integration for alternative lenders.
core.h1: Plaid Bank Data Integration for Lending Underwriting
core.intro: Accelerate underwriting with real-time bank data. Pre-integrated Plaid connectivity for instant account verification, transaction history, and cash-flow analysis—no dev work required.

sections.body: Verify borrower bank accounts in seconds with Plaid Auth. No micro-deposits or 2-3 day wait times. Confirm account ownership, routing numbers, and account status for ACH setup and fraud prevention.

sections.h2: Cash Flow Analysis from Bank Transactions
sections.body: Analyze 3-24 months of transaction history for income verification, expense patterns, and NSF behavior. Categorize transactions, calculate average daily balances, and identify recurring revenue streams. Export data for credit memos.
Monitor funded accounts for early warning signals: declining balances, NSF fees, large withdrawals, and account closures. Set automated alerts to trigger collections or covenant reviews.
Plaid handles bank login credentials and OAuth flows—you never store banking passwords. Data encrypted in transit and at rest. Compliance with GLBA, SOC 2, and regional privacy laws.
No integration headaches. Plaid connectivity included out-of-the-box with token management, error handling, and retry logic. Support for 12,000+ banks and credit unions.

core.title: QuickBooks Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
core.description: Sync QuickBooks data for underwriting and portfolio monitoring. Automated financial analysis from P&L, balance sheets, and cash flow statements.
core.h1: QuickBooks Integration for Lending Underwriting
core.intro: Pull financial data directly from borrower QuickBooks accounts. Automate underwriting with P&L analysis, balance sheet review, and cash flow trends—no manual data entry.

sections.body: Connect borrower QuickBooks accounts via OAuth for read-only access. Pull profit & loss statements, balance sheets, and cash flow statements. Analyze revenue trends, expense ratios, and working capital changes over 12-36 months.

Eliminate manual financial spreading. Calculate DSCR, debt-to-equity, and liquidity ratios automatically. Flag red flags like negative equity, declining revenues, and unusual expenses for manual review.
Monitor funded borrowers with quarterly or monthly QuickBooks syncs. Track covenant compliance, financial deterioration, and early warning indicators. Automate portfolio risk scoring.
QuickBooks OAuth integration means no password storage. Data encrypted and stored with audit logs. Revocable access tokens and borrower consent workflows.
No dev work required. QuickBooks Online and Desktop support included. Handle multi-entity businesses, franchise locations, and parent/subsidiary structures.

core.title: Stripe Payments Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
core.description: Process ACH and card payments with Stripe. Automated loan repayments, fee collections, and reconciliation for alternative lenders.
core.h1: Stripe Payment Processing for Loan Repayments
core.intro: Automate loan repayments with Stripe ACH and card processing. Handle recurring payments, failed payment retries, and instant reconciliation—all built into your lending platform.

sections.body: Charge borrowers via ACH debit, debit cards, or credit cards using Stripe. Support one-time payments, recurring schedules, and custom payment plans. Handle partial payments, prepayments, and manual adjustments.
Configure retry logic for failed ACH transactions and declined cards. Automatically attempt payments 1-3 times with smart spacing. Send payment failure notifications via SMS and email.
Stripe webhooks auto-update payment status in real-time. Reconcile deposits to loan accounts, fees, and interest. Export payment histories for accounting systems and investor reports.
Handle refunds and dispute management through integrated Stripe dashboard. Track chargeback activity and link to borrower accounts. Automated alerts for dispute escalations.
No payment gateway integration needed. Stripe connectivity included with PCI compliance handled. Support for split payments, fee deductions, and multi-party disbursements.

core.title: Twilio SMS Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
core.description: Send SMS notifications and OTP codes with Twilio. Two-factor authentication, payment reminders, and borrower messaging for lenders.
core.h1: Twilio SMS Integration for Lender Communications
core.intro: Communicate with borrowers via SMS for OTP codes, payment reminders, and status updates. Pre-integrated Twilio connectivity with templated messaging and delivery tracking.

sections.body: Secure borrower logins with SMS-based OTP codes delivered via Twilio. Configure code expiration, retry limits, and fallback methods. Prevent unauthorized access and account takeover fraud.
Send automated payment reminders 1-3 days before due dates. Follow up on past-due accounts with escalating message templates. Track delivery status and response rates.
Keep borrowers informed with SMS updates: application received, documents needed, approval decisions, and funding confirmations. Reduce support inquiries with proactive messaging.
Respect TCPA regulations with opt-in consent tracking, opt-out handling, and quiet hours. Template library with pre-approved messaging for different loan stages.
No integration work required. Twilio SMS included out-of-the-box with message queuing, retry logic, and delivery webhooks. Support for short codes and toll-free numbers.

core.title: SendGrid Email Integration for Lenders | Lendgismo
core.description: Send transactional emails with SendGrid. OTP codes, payment receipts, and borrower notifications with deliverability tracking.
core.h1: SendGrid Email Integration for Lending Communications
core.intro: Deliver reliable transactional emails with SendGrid. Pre-integrated for OTP codes, payment confirmations, document requests, and borrower updates—track opens and clicks.

sections.body: Send one-time password codes via email for account security. Configurable expiration times, branded email templates, and fallback to SMS if needed.

Trigger emails based on loan lifecycle events: application submitted, documents requested, underwriting updates, approval letters, funding confirmations, and payment receipts. Template editor with merge tags for personalization.
SendGrid handles email deliverability, SPF/DKIM authentication, and IP warming. Track bounce rates, spam reports, and unsubscribe requests. White-label sender domains for brand consistency.
Monitor email opens, clicks, and engagement rates. Link click tracking for document uploads, payment portals, and application submissions. Export metrics for marketing and ops analysis.
SendGrid connectivity included with API key setup and webhook handling. Support for transactional emails, marketing campaigns, and compliance notifications.

core.title: Multi-Tenant Lending Platform | Lendgismo

core.h1: Multi-Tenant Lending OS for Multiple Brands
core.intro: Power multiple lending brands, ISOs, or partner lenders from a single codebase. Enterprise-grade multi-tenant architecture with strict data isolation and per-tenant customization.

sections.body: Each tenant gets isolated database schemas, encrypted data storage, and independent user access controls. No data leakage between tenants. Support hundreds of tenants on shared infrastructure with guaranteed performance.

Customize logos, color schemes, domains, and email templates per tenant. Configure unique credit policies, underwriting rules, and workflow stages. White-label each tenant completely—borrowers never see other brands.
Super-admin controls for creating tenants, managing subscriptions, and monitoring system health. Tenant admins manage their own users, workflows, and integrations without affecting others.

ISO networks white-labeling for lender clients. Lending-as-a-Service platforms serving multiple financial institutions. Parent companies managing subsidiary brands. Franchise lending platforms with location-based tenants.
Battle-tested multi-tenant architecture handling 50+ tenants in production. SOC 2 compliant infrastructure with tenant-level audit logs. Deploy on AWS, Azure, or GCP with auto-scaling and redundancy.

core.description: Empower ISO partners with branded portals for deal submission, tracking, and commission management. White-label broker portal with role-based access.
core.h1: ISO & Broker Portal for Partner Management
core.intro: Scale your ISO network with self-service partner portals. ISOs submit deals, track approvals, and manage commissions—all with your branding and compliance controls.

sections.body: ISOs submit applications via branded portals with guided workflows. Upload borrower documents, enter merchant details, and track deal status in real-time. Reduce back-and-forth emails and phone calls by 80%.

Automate referral fee calculations based on funded amounts, loan products, and tier structures. ISOs view commission statements, payment history, and 1099-ready reports. Support for splits, override structures, and bonus tiers.
Control what ISOs can see and do: submit deals only, view own pipeline, or access full partner analytics. Hierarchical ISO structures with master agents, sub-agents, and regional managers.

Track every ISO action with timestamp, IP address, and user identity. Monitor for suspicious patterns, enforce document requirements, and maintain NMLS compliance records. Export ISO activity for audits.
Proven with MCA funders managing 100+ ISO relationships. White-label branding, custom workflows per ISO tier, and API access for CRM integration. Deploy in weeks with ongoing support.

core.title: Lending Decisioning Rules Engine | Lendgismo
core.description: Configure credit policies with rules-based decisioning. Automate approval, decline, and manual review decisions with transparent logic and audit trails.
core.h1: Decisioning Rules Engine for Automated Approvals
core.intro: Standardize credit decisions with configurable rules, scorecards, and thresholds. Automate 60-80% of approvals while maintaining credit quality and compliance.

sections.body: Build credit policies with if-then-else logic: minimum credit score, debt-to-income ratios, cash flow thresholds, and industry restrictions. Layer rules for different loan products, amounts, and borrower types.

Create custom scorecards with weighted factors: credit score, revenue trends, time in business, bank balance, and industry risk. Set approval cut-offs, manual review bands, and auto-decline thresholds.
Route borderline applications to underwriters with pre-populated decision recommendations. Underwriters override rules with documented reasoning. Track override rates and credit quality metrics.
Every decision shows which rules triggered, data points evaluated, and final score. Borrowers receive clear decline reasons. Audit trails for regulatory exams and investor due diligence.
Deployed by MCA funders, ABL providers, and SMB lenders making 100-10,000 decisions monthly. No-code rule editor for ops teams. Version control and A/B testing for policy iterations.

core.title: Loan Pricing Engine for Alternative Lenders
core.description: Standardize loan pricing with configurable fee structures, rate sheets, and margin calculations. Pricing software for MCA, ABL, and SMB lenders.
core.h1: Pricing Engine for Consistent Loan Pricing
core.intro: Eliminate pricing inconsistency with a centralized pricing engine. Configure rate sheets, fee structures, and margin calculations for consistent quoting and profitability.

sections.body: Build pricing tiers based on credit profile, loan amount, term length, and risk factors. Support for factor rates, interest rates, origination fees, and servicing charges. Real-time pricing calculations with borrower-facing quotes.
Adjust pricing based on market conditions, funding costs, and portfolio risk. Set floors, ceilings, and approval requirements for off-sheet pricing. Track pricing exceptions and margin erosion.
Calculate all-in yields, cost of capital, and expected returns per loan. Factor in origination costs, servicing expenses, and default probabilities. Export pricing analytics for portfolio management.
Log every pricing decision with operator, timestamp, and inputs. Demonstrate fair lending practices and consistent pricing policies. Export reports for regulatory exams.
Used by lenders managing multi-product portfolios with complex fee structures. Version control for rate sheet changes. API access for external quoting tools and CRMs.

core.title: Term Sheets & E-Signature for Lenders | Lendgismo
core.description: Generate branded term sheets and loan agreements with e-signature workflows. DocuSign integration for fast loan closing and document management.
core.h1: Term Sheets & E-Signature for Fast Loan Closing
core.intro: Accelerate loan closing with automated term sheet generation and e-signature workflows. Create custom templates, track signing status, and store executed documents.

sections.body: Generate loan term sheets from approved application data—no manual data entry. Customize templates per loan product with your branding, legal language, and fee disclosures. Preview, edit, and send for signature in seconds.

Integrate with DocuSign, Adobe Sign, or built-in e-signature. Send multi-party documents (borrower, guarantor, ISO) with signing order and reminders. Track who viewed, signed, and when—down to the page.

Build reusable templates with merge fields for borrower name, loan amount, term, rate, and custom fields. Support for conditional clauses, multiple signers, and attachment pages. Version control for template updates.
Maintain executed documents with timestamp, IP address, and certificate of completion. Export signed agreements for loan files and audits. Track template usage and signature completion rates.
Process 1,000+ signatures monthly for MCA funders and SMB lenders. Mobile-friendly signing experience for borrowers. Automated reminders and expiration workflows reduce signing delays.

core.title: Document Management for Lending | Lendgismo
core.description: Centralized document storage, versioning, and access controls for loan files. Secure document management with audit trails and regulatory compliance.
core.h1: Document Management for Loan Files & Compliance
core.intro: Organize loan files with secure, searchable document storage. Upload, categorize, and track documents across the loan lifecycle with role-based access and audit trails.

sections.body: Store all loan-related documents: applications, bank statements, tax returns, term sheets, executed agreements, and correspondence. Auto-organize by borrower, loan, and document type. Search by filename, content, or metadata.
Track document versions with upload timestamp, user, and change notes. Retrieve prior versions for audits or disputes. Prevent document overwrites with automatic versioning.

Control who can view, download, upload, or delete documents. Restrict access to sensitive documents (tax returns, bank statements) to underwriters and admins. Audit every document access with user and timestamp.
Extract data from bank statements, tax forms, and invoices with OCR. Pre-populate application fields from uploaded documents. Reduce manual data entry and transcription errors.
Encrypt documents at rest and in transit (AES-256, TLS 1.3). Maintain document retention policies per regulatory requirements. Export loan files for audits, portfolio sales, or legal proceedings.

core.title: Collections & Payment Workflows | Lendgismo
core.description: Automate collections with payment reminders, dunning sequences, and delinquency management. Collections software for alternative lenders.
core.h1: Collections & Payment Workflows for Lenders
core.intro: Reduce delinquency with automated payment reminders and collections workflows. Manage late payments, payment plans, and charge-offs with compliance-ready audit trails.

sections.body: Send email and SMS reminders before payment due dates, on due dates, and after missed payments. Customize messaging per loan product, delinquency stage, and borrower segment. Track open rates and payment conversions.

Escalate late loans through configurable stages: early delinquency, late stage, pre-default, and charge-off. Auto-assign to collections reps, trigger phone calls, and log contact attempts. Pause auto-debit for payment plans.

Offer payment plans with reduced payments, extended terms, or interest-only periods. Document forbearance agreements and track compliance. Resume normal servicing when borrower returns to current status.
Log all collections activity with timestamp, rep name, and outcome. Prevent contact outside allowed hours or after cease-and-desist requests. Export collections logs for regulatory exams.

Used by lenders managing 500-10,000 active loans with 5-15% delinquency rates. Analytics on collections effectiveness, payment plan success, and charge-off trends. API access for third-party collections agencies.

core.title: Portfolio Analytics & Reporting | Lendgismo
core.description: Real-time portfolio analytics for loan performance, risk metrics, and investor reporting. Business intelligence dashboards for alternative lenders.
core.h1: Portfolio Analytics & Reporting for Lenders
core.intro: Make data-driven decisions with real-time portfolio analytics. Track origination volume, loan performance, credit quality, and profitability with customizable dashboards.

sections.body: Monitor key metrics: loans funded, outstanding principal, delinquency rates, charge-offs, and yield. Filter by loan product, origination date, ISO partner, or industry. Drill down into loan-level details.

Track application volume, approval rates, funding conversion, and time-to-close. Identify bottlenecks in underwriting or document collection. Compare performance across channels, products, and time periods.

Analyze vintage performance, default curves, and loss rates by cohort. Monitor early warning signals: payment delays, covenant breaches, or declining cash flow. Stress test portfolio under economic scenarios.

Generate monthly investor reports with portfolio composition, payment activity, and covenant compliance. Export data for warehouse lenders, institutional investors, or regulators. Automate report delivery schedules.

Proven with lenders managing $10M-$500M portfolios across multiple loan products. Customizable KPIs, scheduled reports, and API access for BI tools (Tableau, Power BI). Support for multi-entity consolidation.

core.title: Compliance & Audit Trail for Lenders | Lendgismo
core.description: Maintain regulatory compliance with comprehensive audit trails, user activity logs, and data retention policies. SOC 2 compliant lending software.
core.h1: Compliance & Audit Trail for Regulatory Confidence
core.intro: Document every action with tamper-proof audit logs. Meet regulatory requirements with data retention, user activity tracking, and exportable audit reports.

sections.body: Log every user action: logins, data access, application edits, decisions, document views, and system changes. Capture timestamp, user identity, IP address, and action details. Immutable logs prevent tampering or deletion.

Configure retention policies per data type: applications (7 years), loan files (loan term + 3 years), audit logs (10 years). Auto-archive old records to cold storage. Retrieve archived data for audits or legal holds.

Export audit trails for regulatory exams, investor due diligence, or legal discovery. Pre-built reports for TILA, ECOA, FCRA, and state licensing requirements. Document fair lending practices and consistent underwriting.

Enforce role-based access with principle of least privilege. Monitor for suspicious activity: unusual login times, bulk data exports, or privilege escalation. Alert admins to potential security incidents.
